title: Confessions of An English Psychopath
description: Previous cover edition for ASIN B01MQXHDIPFor alternate cover editions see here and hereAn unscrupulous young man is recruited to work as an assassin for the British Secret Service. The work goes well until the day he gains access to a locked room at his place of work, and uncovers a terrible secret. James Bond meets Dexter Morgan in this twisted, shocking, and savagely funny novel.
author: Jack Strange
